meanings.definition: A type of deep-sea submersible vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The bathyscaphs explored the ocean depths with ease.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used bathyscaphs to study marine life in the deep sea.
meanings.sent3: The bathyscaphs had a party at the bottom of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a bathyscaphs diving into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The bathyscaphs illuminated the mysterious underwater world.

meanings.sent1: We saw two bathyscaphs descending into the deep sea.
meanings.sent2: The fleet of bathyscaphs was ready for exploration.
meanings.sent3: The bathyscaphs gathered for a group photo.
meanings.sent4: Their teamwork was like a school of bathyscaphs moving in unison.
meanings.sent5: The bathyscaphs symbolized unity in their underwater mission.
